title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2895/95 of 15 December 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1318/93 on detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2067/92 on measures to promote and market quality beef and veal
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2895/95 of 15 December 1995 amending Regulation (EEC) No 1318/93 on detailed rules for the application of Council Regulation (EEC) No 2067/92 on measures to promote and market quality beef and veal
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Regulation (EEC) No 1318/93 is amended as follows:
1. Article 4 (3) (b) is replaced by the following:
'(b) that an assessment study will be carried out by an independent body within the time limit laid down in Article 7 (3), at the applicant's expense;`
2. The following subparagraph is added to Article 7 (2):
'However, the advance and payments referred to in paragraph 1 may not together exceed 75 % of the entire Community financial contribution.`
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1996.

(2) shall apply to contracts concluded from that date.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
